useEffect(() => { if (data) { setLocalData(data.map((item, index) => { item.key = index rowData.map(i => { if (item.key === i.key) { item.VueAnatomique = i.VueAnatomique item.Injection = i.Injection setChageRow(a) } return (
) } console.log(data); export default Home_Page
